name: Joshua De Guzman
bio: Joshua de Guzman works at Freelancer.com as a Mobile Engineer and he has been shipping native code to more than one million users in Android. Now, together with his team, are exploring the possibilities of integrating Flutter in their projects. He started a small community, Flutter Philippines (www.flutter.ph), together with the people passionate about learning Flutter to help share and grow the adaption of the technology here in the country. On his free time, you'll find him watching ABC's Shark Tank and some action movies on Netflix.
